short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to improve the workflow of development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on will help you a bit more with navigating fast between JIRA tickets.

• New UI
• Set the Jira quick search URL to your own desires.
• Delete session cookie on localhost easily when logging in between dashboards
• Ticket bar is now a search bar to conveniently search for JIRA tickets related to your search term, or type the ticket ID to directly navigate to the specific ticket page)
• In the search bar, after typing the ticket ID, you can open the ticket in a new tab with ctr/cmd + enter
• Options page; Save last search term; set your local url
